(Translated by Google) We were three people there. Two with ribs and one with pork knuckle. Everyone's food was cold. Since the boiled potatoes had already become chewy, it must have been a while since this was made. The pork knuckle was very salty and was not drained sufficiently and not steamed well enough. They are supposed to have made the skin on the ribs soft, but this is not true. I won't be going there again.

We var tre personer der. To med ribbe og en med pinnekjÃ¸tt. Maten til alle var kald. Da de kokte potetene allerede var blitt seige er det nok en stund siden dette ble laget. PinnekjÃ¸ttet var veldig salt og var ikke vannet ut tilstrekkelig og heller ikke dampet godt nok. De skal ha for at svoren pÃ¥ ribba var spÃ¸r, men dette holder ikke. Blir ikke en tur til der.

There was only one other table there when I walked in with my mom at 5:30pm. However, it took the waitress forever to attend to us, and to take our orders and to even give us our drinks. Do note that the drinks fridge was 10cm away from my momâ€™s chair, and there is no need to delay anything by 10 minutes if itâ€™s right in front of you.

reviewText:
(Translated by Google) Summer end with work colleagues. There were 9 of us and we ordered Tapas. We got foccacia with aioli and cured meat/cheese boards for starters, which were very good! The tapas were not that good.
Albondigas con salsa, tasted like chicken balls from kiwi with ready-made tomato sauce from a can.
Toasted bread slices with the same type of tomato sauce, quite ok, but unfortunately no highlights.
Tortilla EspaÃ±ol was quite ok, but a bit tasteless and uncharacteristic.
Patatas Bravas, were cut into small cubes and fried a bit hard so they were dry at the edges. Same tomato sauce as mentioned earlier, or at least tasted like that..
Gambas pilpil (fried shrimp in garlic) tasted very good!
Fried chorizo â€‹â€‹sausage was not good. Dry-fried chorizo â€‹â€‹slices on the verge of burning did not taste good unfortunately.

Otherwise we had a very nice evening. The place has a very cozy backyard with lamps in the trees and nice seating. Intimate and cozy.
The service was impeccable, and we received good attention. Recommended, but maybe choose something other than tapas, unless they have addressed it in the past ðŸ¤žðŸ¼ðŸ˜Š

Patatas Bravas, var kuttet i litt smÃ¥ terninger og stekt litt hardt sÃ¥ de var tÃ¸rre i kantene. Samme tomatsaus som nevnt tidligere, eller smakte i alle fall sÃ¥nn..
Gambas pilpil (stekte reker i hvitlÃ¸k) smakte veldig bra!
Stekt chorizopÃ¸lse var ikke bra. TÃ¸rrstekte chorizoskiver pÃ¥ grensen til brent smakte ikke godt dessverre.

Ellers hadde vi en veldig hyggelig kveld. Stedet har en veldig koselig bakgÃ¥rd med lamper i trÃ¦rne og fine sitteplasser. Intimt og koselig.
Servicen var upÃ¥klagelig, og vi fikk god oppmerksomhet. Anbefales, men velg kanskje noe annet enn tapas, med mindre de har tatt tak i det i ettertid ðŸ¤žðŸ¼ðŸ˜Š

(Translated by Google) Lovely little place right by Hauketo station. The menus were being updated so they didn't have everything on the menu. It took a long time to order food, and it felt a bit like we were bothering the one waiter (who also seems to be in charge there) when we apologized for ordering. And we didn't really get quite what we ordered either. The ribs were a bit dry and lacked bbq sauce (they were called bbq ribs) while the oompfen was served partly cold. Large portions are a plus, but there was cheese on the fries, which wasn't on the menu either and could have caused problems if you are lactose intolerant. Prices are steep compared to the service, but the place has a lovely vibe and the service is friendly - albeit a bit slow.

(Original)

Tok lang tid Ã¥ fÃ¥ bestilt mat, og det fÃ¸ltes litt som vi plagde den ene servitÃ¸ren (som ogsÃ¥ virker Ã¥ vÃ¦re ansvarlig der) da vi unnskyldte oss for Ã¥ fÃ¥ bestille. Og vi fikk vel ikke egentlig helt det vi bestilte heller. Ribsene var litt tÃ¸rre og manglet bbq saucen (de het bbq ribs) mens oompfen ble servert delvis kald. Store porsjoner er pluss, men det var ost pÃ¥ pommes fritesâ€™en, noe som heller ikke stod pÃ¥ menyen og som kunne skapt problemer ved feks laktoseintoleranse. Stive priser sett opp mot servicen, men stedet har en herlig vibe og servicen er vennlig - om enn litt treg.

reviewText:
(Translated by Google) A confirmation party with around 25 guests worked out great at Essa. The sun was shining, so it was perfect that we could move the party out into the backyard on long tables.

The plans for tapas were replaced with a new grill menu, which turned out very well. Plenty of pulled pork, chicken, slow-grilled ribs, spareribs, buns, coleslaw, salad and french fries were among the dishes served.

The outdoor areas were adjacent to the Ljanselva river with good opportunities for nice photos of the confirmation candidate.

(Original)
